lines.text: That rat-soup-eatin', insecure honky motherfucker!
Ghosts? If you ever see a ghost, cut the motherfucker.
Yeah, I'm so bad, I kick my own ass twice a day. Shit, you ain't sayin' nothin'!
I'm gonna let 'em know that Dolemite is back on the scene! I'm gonna let 'em know that Dolemite is my name, and fuckin' up motherfuckers is my game!
Man, move over and let me pass 'fore they have be to pullin' these Hush Puppies out your motherfuckin' ass!

[after woman hands him a pair of cotton boxer shorts]
Bitch, you bring me these goddamn cotton dra - - you know I don't wear no fuckin' cotton draws!
I am Joe Blow, the lover man! You should be payin' me, bitch!
You no-business, born-insecure, junkyard motherfucker!
You, guard! I want you to take these cheap motherfuckers and wipe your ass with them!
[referring to his prison-guard suit]
By the way, who're you waitin' for anyway?
I'm waitin' for Dolemite!
For who?
Dolemite, motherfucker, ya heard?
Remember, we live here with the rats and roaches, so we don't need no more rats telling us what to do! We will create our own war,. And we don't need no redneck mother -
[Detectives enter church]
Oh, yes Lord! Mothers are the best friends we have!
Meet me at the Total Experience in one half an hour.
Damn! Looks like my women is on time.
Now, I know you think you're smart, see, 'cause you got all them flashy clothes, you got that big car there, you got all them Black bitches working for you.
You forgot about the white ones.
[repeated line]
Can you dig it?
I wanna let you know that Dolemite is my name, and fuckin' up motherfuckers is my game!

[First lines]
Okay, Dolemite, the warden wants to see you.
Oh, shit. What the hell does that rat-soup-eatin' motherfucker want with me?

Some folks say that Willie Green was the baddest motherfucker the world ever seen. But I want you to hold onto your seats. And hold onto them tight. 'Cause you now getting' ready to see the story of me. Yes, me! The badass. Dolemite!
